channel.title: Getting error while attaching the devices
channel.description:
While trying to attach the device to octave dashboard, i am getting following error.
1] Serial number already in use 2] IMEI already in use
Can anybody help me on this?

item.title: Getting error while attaching the devices
item.dc:creator: dpinc
item.description:
I had this occur once when I had the device set up in another test account having used it for some previous testing. Once I deleted it from the first account I was able to add it to the second account where it was failing.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting error while attaching the devices

item.title: Getting error while attaching the devices
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
probably you need to contact distributor

Read full topic
